Class CreeperBurntBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block.CreeperBurntBlock

extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a burnt block.

    nitnelave

    • Method Detail

      • replace

        public boolean replace(boolean shouldDrop)
        Replace the block.
        Parameters:
        shouldDrop - If true, in case of failure, the replacement isn't postponed, but the block is dropped.
        Returns:
        False if the replacement was postponed.

        public boolean postPone(int delay)
        Postpone the replacement of the block.
        Parameters:
        delay - The amount of time to postpone by, in sec.
        Returns:
